GSD.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 7 Update 13 and earlier, 6 Update 39 and earlier, and 5.0 Update 39 and earlier allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to JMX.

description_data.value: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 7 Update 13 and earlier, 6 Update 39 and earlier, and 5.0 Update 39 and earlier allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to JMX.
